description:
A Dancerian that looks like a rabbit falls into Kotone`s house. Her name is Adeline, and she offers to help Kotone find and thank the mysterious man who saved her, even though she doesn`t know who he is or where to find him. Their search goes on, until one day, Mink and Tank attack the town bazaar, and Flash Beat arrives to stop them. But when he messes up his finishing move, Kotone and Adoline must transform into Wink Beat to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 踊るヒロイン!! 超モフる~♪
